properties.Name: Incentive
properties.Description: An incentive is something that motivates an individual to perform an action.

Columns.Name: IncentiveId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Incentive.

Columns.Name: IncentiveStartDate
Columns.Description: The start date or first date that the Incentive is in effect.

Columns.Name: IncentiveEndDate
Columns.Description: The end date or last date that the Incentive is in effect.

Columns.Name: IncentiveEligibilityStatement
Columns.Description: A statement of the eligibility of an employee or third party to be assigned incentives using the associated Incentive.

Columns.Name: IncentiveRestrictionsStatement
Columns.Description: A statement detailing the restrictions that are applied to the associated Incentive.

Columns.Name: IncentiveMinimumSalesRevenueAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum sales revenue amount for which the associated Incentive is defined or valid.

Columns.Name: IncentiveMinimumNumberUnits
Columns.Description: The minimum number of units for which the associated Incentive is defined or valid.

Columns.Name: IncentiveBaseAmount
Columns.Description: The base incentive amount paid in accordance with a sale under the Incentive.

Columns.Name: IncentiveAmountPerUnit
Columns.Description: The amount of the Incentive to be paid per unit sold.

Columns.Name: IncentiveFlatFeeAmount
Columns.Description:
The flat fee paid as an incentive in accordance with a transaction.

This is for cases where the incentive is not calculated as a percentage but rather as a flat incentive regardless of the number of units involved.

Columns.Name: IncentiveTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Incentive Type.
